Title: Barney's Version
Actors: Paul Giamatti, Macha Grenon, Paul Gross, Atom Egoyan
Plot: Take a ride through the life and memories of Barney Panofsky, a hard-drinking, cigar-smoking, foulmouthed 65-year old hockey fanatic and television producer, as he reflects on his life's successes and (numerous) gaffes and failures as the final chapters of his own existence come sharply into focus.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 18 wins & 18 nominations.
